column5: Hi Guys/Gals, been ages,I have been cleaning up my parents house (Father passed away in Feb) .Ifound a never been used,still in original box with directions and plastic carrying case,Pocket Fisherman.I would like an idea of what it is worth,think I bought it as a Christmas gift for my Dad back in 72/73. No it is NOT for sale,but an honest appraisal would be nice,this is staying in the family,thanks Brian
Ebay has em from 30.00 to 50 bucks   Hope this helps!  G
"And Boy Does It Catch Fish"---Yeah I had one--blame it on youth
